AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: gestated warframe
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was gestated in a machine.\nThey were made to fight.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: warframe
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a powerful warframe. The only way to control a warframe is with a somatic link.
